summary: This document is a summary of an account balance statement from Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas for the period from April 1, 2016, to April 30, 2016. It details the account balance, transactions, and fees associated with the account, including deposits, withdrawals, and service charges.

persons.name: Paul Maris
persons.context: Paul Maris is mentioned as the account holder for the Deutsche Bank account detailed in the statement.

persons.name: Dunne Cheekin
persons.context: Dunne Cheekin is also mentioned as an account holder associated with the Deutsche Bank account.

keyFacts: The account balance as of April 1, 2016, was $139,471.92.
The ending balance as of April 30, 2016, was also $139,471.98.
There were service charges and fees totaling $50.00 during the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors on the account statement.
The account is associated with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
